nodes.name: Schedule: Daily 9AM Weekdays
nodes.notes: ‚è∞ TRIGGER: Runs Monday-Friday at 9 AM to fetch new leads from Clay

nodes.name: Fetch New Leads from Clay
Split into Individual Leads
nodes.notes: üîÄ SPLIT: Convert Clay batch response into individual items for processing

nodes.name: Apply Square Footage Heuristics
nodes.notes:
üìê HEURISTICS: Apply industry-based square footage if missing

Defaults per location:
- School: 50,000 sqft
- Retail: 15,000 sqft
- Restaurant: 5,000 sqft
- Office: 25,000 sqft
- Municipality: 100,000 sqft
- Franchise: 10,000 sqft

Multiplies by num_locations and flags for manual review

nodes.name: Get Eligible Utility Providers
nodes.notes:
‚úÖ VALIDATION: Fetch list of eligible utility providers from Airtable

Expected Airtable fields:
- Utility Name (text)
- State (text)
- All_In_Rate (currency)
- Status (single select: Active/Inactive)

nodes.name: Validate Utility Eligibility
nodes.notes:
üîç FILTER: Check if utility provider is eligible

Matches lead's utility + state against Airtable list
Rejects if not found or inactive

nodes.name: IF Eligible?
nodes.notes: ‚ö° BRANCH: Route eligible leads to calculation, rejected to Airtable

nodes.name: Get Usage Intensity Factors
nodes.notes:
üìä LOOKUP: Fetch industry usage intensity factors

Expected Airtable fields:
- Industry (text)
- Usage_Intensity_Factor (number) - kWh per sqft per year

nodes.name: Calculate Solar Savings
nodes.notes:
üßÆ CALCULATOR: Complete solar savings formulas

Formulas:
- kWh Usage = SqFt √ó Intensity Factor
- Annual Energy Cost = kWh √ó Rate
- Annual Credits = kWh √ó 93%
- Customer Cost = Credits √ó Rate √ó 90%
- Annual Savings = Energy Cost - Customer Cost
- Savings % = Savings / Energy Cost √ó 100

nodes.name: Score & Qualify Lead
nodes.notes:
‚≠ê SCORING: Lead qualification logic

Scoring criteria:
- Savings >$10K: +30 pts
- Savings $5K-$10K: +20 pts
- Email contact: +20 pts
- Phone contact: +20 pts
- Eligible utility: +20 pts
- Manual review needed: -10 pts

Qualified threshold: 60+ points

nodes.name: Search Existing Company
nodes.notes: üîç UPSERT: Check if company already exists in Airtable by domain

nodes.name: IF Company Exists?
nodes.notes: ‚ö° BRANCH: Create new or update existing company record

nodes.name: Create Company Record
nodes.notes: ‚ûï CREATE: New company record in Airtable with all enrichment + calculation data

nodes.name: Update Company Record
nodes.notes: üîÑ UPDATE: Existing company with fresh calculations and enrichment data

nodes.name: Merge Company Results
nodes.notes: üîó MERGE: Combine create/update branches

nodes.name: Prepare Contact Records
nodes.notes: üë• CONTACTS: Split contacts for individual creation in Airtable

nodes.name: Create Contact Records
nodes.notes: üë§ CREATE: Individual contact records linked to company

nodes.name: IF Qualified for Outreach?
nodes.notes: ‚ö° BRANCH: Only proceed with outreach if lead is qualified (score >= 60)

assignments.name: prospect_data
assignments.value:
={{ {
  company_name: $json.company_name,
  type: $json.type,
  city: $json.city,
  state: $json.state,
  annual_savings: $json.annual_savings,
  savings_percent: $json.savings_percent,
  kwh_usage: $json.kwh_usage,
  square_footage: $json.square_footage,
  contact_name: $json.contacts?.[0]?.name || 'there',
  contact_title: $json.contacts?.[0]?.title || 'decision maker'
} }}

nodes.name: Prepare Outreach Data
nodes.notes: üì¶ PREP: Structure data for AI personalization and outreach channels

parameters.name: messages

nodes.name: Generate Personalized Email (OpenAI)
nodes.notes:
ü§ñ AI: Generate personalized email copy using GPT-4

Prompt includes:
- Company details and context
- Specific savings numbers
- Industry-specific messaging
- Clear CTA for booking

Output: Subject + Body (plain text)

nodes.name: Parse Email Content
nodes.notes: üìù PARSE: Extract subject line and body from AI-generated email

nodes.name: Send Email via Gmail
nodes.notes:
üìß SEND: Deliver personalized email via Gmail

Sends to primary contact's email
Includes reply-to for responses

nodes.name: Update Email Status in Airtable
nodes.notes: ‚úÖ UPDATE: Mark company as contacted via email with timestamp

nodes.name: Prepare Voice Call Script
nodes.notes:
üìû SCRIPT: Generate personalized voice call script for Vapi

Includes:
- Company-specific details
- Exact savings numbers
- Natural conversation flow
- Voicemail fallback

parameters.name: assistant

nodes.name: Create Vapi Voice Call
nodes.notes:
‚òéÔ∏è VAPI: Initiate outbound AI voice call

MOCK ENDPOINT - Replace with actual Vapi credentials

Configures:
- Phone numbers
- AI assistant with custom script
- Voice settings
- Metadata for tracking

nodes.name: Update Call Status in Airtable
nodes.notes: ‚úÖ UPDATE: Log voice call initiation with Vapi call ID for tracking

nodes.name: Vapi Call Events Webhook
nodes.notes:
üéß WEBHOOK: Listens for Vapi call events

Events:
- call.started
- call.ended
- call.answered
- call.voicemail
- call.intent_detected

URL: https://your-n8n.app/webhook/vapi-webhook

nodes.name: Process Vapi Call Event
nodes.notes:
üîç PROCESS: Parse Vapi webhook events and extract call outcomes

Determines:
- Call status (answered, voicemail, completed)
- Intent (positive, negative, neutral)
- Next action needed

nodes.name: Update Call Outcome in Airtable
nodes.notes: üìù UPDATE: Record call outcome and intent in Airtable

nodes.name: IF Positive Intent?
nodes.notes: ‚ö° BRANCH: If prospect showed interest, send Calendly booking link

nodes.name: Generate Calendly Booking Link
nodes.notes:
üìÖ CALENDLY: Create unique booking link for prospect

MOCK ENDPOINT - Replace with actual Calendly credentials

nodes.name: Get Contact Info
nodes.notes: üë§ LOOKUP: Fetch contact email for sending Calendly link

parameters.subject: Schedule Your Solar Savings Consultation
parameters.message:
={{ `Hi ${$json.Name},

Thank you for your interest in community solar! Based on our conversation, I'm excited to show you how we can help save approximately ${$('Process Vapi Call Event').item.json.annual_savings?.toLocaleString() || 'significant amounts'} annually on energy costs.

Please use this link to schedule a 15-minute consultation at your convenience:

${$('Generate Calendly Booking Link').item.json.booking_url}

I look forward to speaking with you!

Best regards,
Sarah
Community Solar Solutions
555-0100` }}

nodes.name: Send Calendly Link via Email
nodes.notes: üìß SEND: Email Calendly booking link to interested prospect

nodes.name: Update Calendly Sent Status
nodes.notes: ‚úÖ UPDATE: Mark that Calendly link was sent to prospect

nodes.name: Find Contact by Email

parameters.content:
# Full-Featured Workflow Components:

# ‚è∞ Scheduled Trigger ‚Üí HTTP fetch from Clay
# üîç Data Enrichment ‚Üí Clay API with fallback heuristics
# üìä Square Footage Logic ‚Üí Industry-based defaults + manual review flag
# ‚úÖ Utility Validation ‚Üí Check against Airtable eligible list
# üßÆ Savings Calculator ‚Üí Complete formula implementation
# üíæ Airtable Integration ‚Üí Upsert to Companies, Contacts, Deals tables
# ü§ñ AI Email Generation ‚Üí OpenAI personalized outreach
# üìß Email Send ‚Üí Gmail with savings details
# üìû Voice Outreach ‚Üí Vapi.ai call creation
# üìÖ Calendly Booking ‚Üí Webhook listener + calendar sync
# ‚ö†Ô∏è Error Handling ‚Üí Retry logic + email alerts + Airtable logging
# üìà Status Updates ‚Üí Pipeline stage tracking

# Savings Formula:

## kWh Usage = Total SqFt √ó Usage Intensity Factor
## Annual Energy Cost = kWh Usage √ó All-In-Rate
## Annual Credits = kWh Usage √ó 93%
## Customer Cost = Annual Credits √ó All-In-Rate √ó 90%
## Annual Savings = Annual Energy Cost - Customer Cost
## Savings % = (Annual Savings / Annual Energy Cost) √ó 100

# Lead Scoring Criteria

## Annual Savings > $10K      +30     High value
## Annual Savings $5K-$10K    +20     Medium value
## Annual Savings < $5K       +10     Low value
## Email contact available    +20
## Phone contact available    +20
## Eligible utility           +20     Always added if passes filter
## Manual review needed       -10     Heuristic sqft used
# Community Solar Lead Generation & Outreach System
